sentences.english: The Chinese version of Sutras translation has a far-reaching influence on Chinese classical poetry.
sentences.chinese: 汉译佛经对中国古典诗歌有着非常深远的影响。

sentences.english: The same applies to upholding the sutras.
sentences.chinese: 这同样适用于持守佛经。

sentences.english: Liberation and awakened understanding can’t be found by devoting ourselves to the study of the Buddhist scriptures.
sentences.chinese: 解脱和觉醒无法从钻研佛经中获得。

sentences.english: It is my hope that this paper will be of some value for those who conduct research on translation or bibliography of Buddhist Scriptures.
sentences.chinese: 本文对佛经翻译和佛典目录的研究者，具有参考价值。

sentences.english: A Buddhist should read sutras eruditely, and then he can discriminate a sage master from a false one.
sentences.chinese: 佛子可以广读佛经然后以智慧鉴别师傅是否智慧者。

sentences.english: Now I start each day by reading from a buddhist scripture called aparimitayur sutra .
sentences.chinese: 现在，我以阅读佛经《无量寿经》开始一天的生活。

sentences.english: Sutra of Buddha notes Buddha being a sage who possess of ten powers and four forms of fearlessness .
sentences.chinese: 佛经中的记载，世尊是十力具足，四无所畏的圣者。

sentences.english: This source comes from the artistic technique of Sutra stories.
sentences.chinese: 化异类以复仇，来自佛经故事的基本艺术机杼。

sentences.english: It has been pointed out that the stanza is older than the preceding prose passage in the Sutta.
sentences.chinese: 据说韵诗与前面佛经之中的段落相比要老一点。

sentences.english: Xuan Zang went to India and brought back the sutras, so he built the pagoda to house them.
sentences.chinese: 玄奘去印度带回佛经，他建此塔是为了存放佛经。

sentences.english: It is the best of all sutras.
